item.title: Adding Plausible Analytics to Website
item.description: Added Plausible Analytics (plausible.io) to the website last night. Debated if I should make a post about it, figured that I might as well in case anyone accuses me of having “secret” trackers in the future. Out of all the options I looked into, Plausible and Matomo were the two strongest privacy-focused trackers that offered both free roll-your-own (if I ever choose to go the self-hosted route again) and paid cloud versions.
